data.title: Out of the Silent Planet (Space Trilogy #1)
meta_keywords: Out of the Silent Planet (Space Trilogy #1)
data.meta_description: Out of the Silent Planet Space Trilogy  In the first novel of C.S. Lewiss classic science fiction trilogy Dr Ransom a Cambridge academic is abducted and taken on a spaceship to the red planet of Malacandra which he knows as Mars. His captors are plotting to plunder the planets treasures and plan to offer Ransom as a sacrifice to the creatures who live there. Ransom discovers he has come from the silent planet ndash Earth ndash whose tragic story is known throughout the universe...
data.text: In the first novel of C.S. Lewis's classic science fiction trilogy, Dr Ransom, a Cambridge academic, is abducted and taken on a spaceship to the red planet of Malacandra, which he knows as Mars. His captors are plotting to plunder the planet's treasures and plan to offer Ransom as a sacrifice to the creatures who live there. Ransom discovers he has come from the 'silent planet' – Earth – whose tragic story is known throughout the universe...
